original_text: People of all nations, listen to the Lord's message. Shout it aloud for everyone to hear, even those who live on the coasts far away. Say, ‘The Lord chased Israel's people away, but now he will bring them back. He will take care of them, like a shepherd who takes care of his sheep.’ People of all nations, listen to the Lord's message. Shout it aloud for everyone to hear, even those who live on the coasts far away. Say, ‘The Lord chased Israel's people away, but now he will bring them back. He will take care of them, like a shepherd who takes care of his sheep.’ People of all nations, listen to the Lord's message. He will take care of them, like a shepherd who takes care of his sheep.’ People of all nations,
korean_text: 이방들이여 너희는 여호와의 말씀을 듣고 먼 섬에 전파하여 이르기를 이스라엘을 흩으신 자가 그를 모으시고 목자가 그 양 떼에게 행함 같이 그를 지키시리로다

sentences.original_text: even those who live on the coasts far away
The Lord chased Israel's people away
but now he will bring them back
He will take care of them
like a shepherd who takes care of his sheep
